heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden
heroes.bio_loc: Born in a temperate realm, raised with her fiery older sister Lina, Rylai the Crystal Maiden soon found that her innate elemental affinity to ice created trouble for all those around her. Wellsprings and mountain rivers froze in moments if she stopped to rest nearby; ripening crops were bitten by frost, and fruiting orchards turned to mazes of ice and came crashing down, spoiled. When their exasperated parents packed Lina off to the equator, Rylai found herself banished to the cold northern realm of Icewrack, where she was taken in by an Ice Wizard who had carved himself a hermitage at the crown of the Blueheart Glacier. After long study, the wizard pronounced her ready for solitary practice and left her to take his place, descending into the glacier to hibernate for a thousand years. Her mastery of the Frozen Arts has only deepened since that time, and now her skills are unmatched.
heroes.hype_loc: Able to keep her allies supplied with mana as she slows down enemies to ensure a kill, Crystal Maiden is a helpful addition to any team. And, when the opportunity arises, she can unleash her massive ultimate ability to devastate her foes.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Unleashes a high damage blizzard upon her foes

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova
abilities.desc_loc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
abilities.lore_loc: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
notes_loc: Crystal Nova provides vision in the targeted area for the duration.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_frostbite
abilities.desc_loc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts %creep_duration% seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
abilities.lore_loc: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura
abilities.desc_loc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a %proximity_bonus_radius% radius of Crystal Maiden receive %proximity_bonus_factor%x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives %self_factor%x the bonus.
abilities.lore_loc: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_crystal_clone
abilities.desc_loc: Slides backward, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a %frostbite_radius% AoE around its place.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
notes_loc: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts %slow_duration% second).
abilities.shard_loc:
Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move %shard_self_movement_speed_slow_pct%%% slower during this.

Increases total number of explosions by %shard_bonus_explosion%%%.
abilities.scepter_loc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move %shard_self_movement_speed_slow_pct%%% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by %shard_bonus_explosion%%%. Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over %frostbite_delay%s.
